title: Nebraska Public Records Request – DUI Arrest Following 911 Self-Call (March 2023, Highway 77)

communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Nebraska Public Records Request – DUI Arrest Following 911 Self-Call (March 2023, Highway 77)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

copies of all video and audio records related to the DUI arrest of an unidentified male driver on or around March 2023, in Lancaster County, who inadvertently called 911 on himself while driving northbound on U.S. Highway 77.

Please include:

All body-worn camera footage from deputies involved in the stop and arrest

Any dashcam/in-car video from patrol vehicles responding

The full 911 call recordings made by the suspect (referenced in LCSO’s Facebook post and news media)

Any dispatch audio, CAD logs, or radio transmissions linked to the incident

Footage showing field sobriety tests and BAC test results, if recorded

Incident Details:

Date: March 2023 (exact date not specified, but video released publicly in September 2023)

Location: U.S. Highway 77, northbound lane, Lancaster County, NE

Summary: 911 caller reported another vehicle driving on the wrong side of the road; it was later discovered that he was the wrong-way driver and intoxicated. Suspect admitted this on scene and to deputies. BAC was reported to be over twice the legal limit.

Please notify me of any fees prior to fulfilling the request. If any material is withheld, I request that all non-exempt portions be provided and that you cite specific statutory exemptions.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: CPRA Request – Traffic Stop Involving Spider Monkey (Rolls-Royce Ghost, January 1, 2025)

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: CPRA Request – Traffic Stop Involving Spider Monkey (Rolls-Royce Ghost, January 1, 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

copies of all video and audio records related to the traffic stop conducted on the night of January 1, 2025, by CHP officers in Madera County, involving a Rolls-Royce Ghost.

Please include:

All body-worn camera footage and dashcam/in-car video from units involved in the stop and search

Any 911 calls, dispatch audio, or CAD logs associated with the traffic stop

Footage or documentation of the seizure of marijuana and the spider monkey

Photos or video taken during evidence collection or animal handoff to Madera County Animal Services

Incident Summary:

Date: January 1, 2025 (evening)

Location: Madera County, CA

Vehicle: Rolls-Royce Ghost

Reported Seizures:

4 containers of marijuana

5 cellphones

1-month-old spider monkey wearing a onesie

Notes: The primate was confiscated and transferred to Madera County Animal Services. The incident has received statewide media coverage.

Please notify me of any fees prior to fulfilling the request. If any portion of the records is exempt from disclosure, I request that you provide the non-exempt portions along with the specific exemptions relied upon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Texas Public Information Act Request – January 9, 2025 “Suspicious Person” Snowman Incident

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Texas Public Information Act Request – January 9, 2025 “Suspicious Person” Snowman Incident
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

copies of all video and audio recordings related to the McKinney Police Department’s response to a suspicious person call on January 9, 2025, which was publicly reported to have involved a snowman.

Please include:

All body-worn camera footage from officers who responded to the call

Any dashcam/in-car footage from patrol vehicles present at the scene

Any internal department video or social media footage used or produced by the department in connection with the incident

Any dispatch audio or CAD logs referencing the original call

Incident Details:

Date: January 9, 2025

Location: McKinney, TX (exact address unknown)

Nature of Call: Suspicious person, which turned out to be a snowman

Officers Involved: At least two officers (as mentioned in official McKinney PD press and social media release)

Public Commentary: Described humorously by the department as an "arrest" of a snowman with "a history of frosty behavior"

If any part of the requested material is exempt from disclosure, please release the non-exempt portions and cite the specific exemption justifying the withholding. Please inform me of any associated fees before fulfilling this request.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
